value.title: What is Google Bard | Google Bard Explained | ChatGPT vs Google Bard | Edureka
value.excerpt: This Edureka video on 𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐢𝐬 𝐆𝐨𝐨𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐁𝐚𝐫𝐝 will talk about the new experimental language model created by Google called “Bard”. Bard AI is designed on top of Google’s current AI language model, BERT, to understand natural language processing tasks like question answering, sentiment analysis,
